net.hka.barista.model

Interface Drink

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DrinkImpl

    public interface Drink
    Declare public API for drinks that are provided by Barista-Matic machine.
    Author:
    Hany Kamal

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<Ingredient,java.lang.Integer> getDrinkIngredients()
      Return ingredients along with the units that are required to make the drink.
      java.lang.String getDrinkName()
      Return drink name.
      double getTotalPrice()
      Return the total cost price for the drink, that is calculated from the unit price of each ingredient of the drink.
